items.sentence: If you know anyone who might be interested in this, feel free to pass it along.
I want to know what you want me to do with all the stuff you left in my garage.
Tom took a couple of sleeping pills, hoping that he'd get a good night's sleep.
My five year old daughter always goes to kindergarten happy and full of energy.
I don't quite understand why you're commenting on a French sentence in English.
I just don't understand what goes through the minds of people who troll forums.
I hadn't recognized the importance of this document until you told me about it.
If the weather holds, we should be able to get this done by the end of the day.
Seeing what you have in your suitcases, I guess you're planning on a long stay.
Tom jacked up the car, so he could take off the flat tire and put on the spare.
